folder: Richmond Terrace & Van Street, Staten Island, NY
text:
1554 and 1550 Richmond terrace, south side, east of Van Street. No. 1554, the 2½-story frame house, belonged to C. M. Pine in 1874 (Beers's map).

July 5, 1932

P. L. Sperr
title: Richmond: Richmond Terrace - Van Street

folder: Richmond Terrace & Van Street, Staten Island, NY
text:
1580 Richmond Terrace, at the S.W. corner of Van Street, showing the office of C.W. Hunt Co., Inc. This house was the home of Mrs. Minott in 1874, and of Dr. Robinson in 1898.

July 5, 1932

P. L. Sperr
title: Richmond: Richmond Terrace - Van Street
